trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class that supports automatic background pagination and tracking content positions across repaginations in addition to the methods and properties of its own base class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base abstrata que oferece suporte a posições de conteúdo de paginação e controle automático de plano de fundo em repaginations além dos métodos e propriedades de sua própria classe base.

trans-unit.source: By default, a DynamicDocumentPaginator will automatically pre-paginate content in the background (this process begins when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> is `true`, which is the default setting).
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, um DynamicDocumentPaginator será automaticamente previamente pagina conteúdo em segundo plano (este processo começa quando <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>é `true`, que é a configuração padrão).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> is `true`, the layout will also be repaginated due to changes in content or changes in <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>é `true`, o layout também será possível repaginated devido a alterações no conteúdo ou alterações na <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event occurs upon completion of pagination (or repagination) of one or more pages, such as in the following situations: - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> events occur as content is paginated in the background.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>evento ocorre após a conclusão da paginação (ou repaginação) de uma ou mais páginas, tal como nas seguintes situações:- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>eventos ocorrem, como o conteúdo é paginado em segundo plano.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation, the event may occur upon paginating one or multiple pages (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> specifies which pages have been paginated).
trans-unit.target: Dependendo da implementação, o evento pode ocorrer durante a paginação de uma ou várias páginas (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> Especifica quais páginas têm sido paginadas).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - Calls to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A> may cause an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event to occur if the page specified has not been paginated.
trans-unit.target: -Chamadas para <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A>pode causar um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>evento ocorra se a página especificada não tem sido paginada.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if background pagination is enabled (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`) but pagination has only been completed up to the third page, a call of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> with an argument of 6 will cause pages four, five, six, and seven to be paginated.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a paginação em segundo plano está habilitada (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`), mas a paginação apenas foi concluída até a terceira página, uma chamada de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>com um argumento de 6 será causa páginas quatro, cinco, seis e sete para ser paginada.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Upon completion, a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event will be raised with <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> settings of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> = 4 and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> = 4.
trans-unit.target: Após a conclusão, um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>evento será gerado com <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>configurações de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>= 4 e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>= 4.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: - With background pagination enabled (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`), a change in <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> on flow-format content, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, may cause repagination and associated <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> events.
trans-unit.target: -Com a paginação de plano de fundo habilitada (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`), uma alteração no <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>no conteúdo do formato de fluxo, como um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, pode causar repaginação e associados <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> has no effect in repagination on fixed-format content, such as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>, where the visual page size does not affect the layout.
trans-unit.target: Observe que <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>não tem nenhum efeito em repaginação no formato fixo de conteúdo, como <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>, onde o tamanho da página visual não afeta o layout.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> event also occurs when background pagination is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>evento também ocorre quando a paginação em segundo plano está desabilitada.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: For example, if there is only one page of content and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `false`), calling <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> with an argument of 0 will result in two events: 1.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se houver apenas uma página de conteúdo e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>= `false`), chamar <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>com um argumento de 0 resultará em dois eventos: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event with <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> settings of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> = 0 and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> = 1.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>evento com <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>configurações de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>= 0 e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>= 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> for the specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, retorna um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> para <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> especificado

trans-unit.source: The object to return the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> of.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para retornar o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> de.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> of the given object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> do objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, retorna o número da página com base em zero do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If pages prior to the `contentPosition` have not been formatted, they will be paginated synchronously prior to returning the requested page number.
trans-unit.target: Se páginas antes do `contentPosition` não foram formatados, eles serão ser paginados síncrona antes de retornar o número da página solicitada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A> provides similar functionality as GetPageNumber, but with asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>fornece funcionalidade semelhante GetPageNumber, mas com operação assíncrona.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content position whose page number is needed.
trans-unit.target: A posição do conteúdo cujo número de página é necessária.

trans-unit.source: An representing zero-based page number where the specified contentPosition appears.
trans-unit.target: Um que representa o número da página de base zero onde especificado contentPosition aparece.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, returns (through the This method raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event) the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna de maneira assíncrona, (por meio do método gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"> </xref> evento) o número de página com base em zero do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The only way to cancel the asynchronous operation of this method is to cancel all asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: É a única maneira de cancelar a operação assíncrona do método Cancelar todas as operações assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: Contrast this with the other overload of this method: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>.
trans-unit.target: Compare isso com a outra sobrecarga desse método: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The page number is passed to the event as one of the event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O número da página é passado para o evento como um dos argumentos do evento.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29> for how to use this method to get the page number.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>para saber como usar esse método para obter o número da página.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: The content position whose page number is needed.
trans-unit.target: A posição do conteúdo cujo número de página é necessária.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, returns (through the This method raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event) the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna de maneira assíncrona, (por meio do método gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"> </xref> evento) o número de página com base em zero do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This overload of the method makes it possible to cancel this asynchronous operation without cancelling all asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga do método torna possível cancelar essa operação assíncrona sem cancelar todas as operações assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The following steps illustrate how to retrieve the page number of a given `contentPosition` asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: As etapas a seguir ilustram como recuperar o número de página de um determinado `contentPosition` assincronamente.

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler> delegate and add it to be notified of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> events.
trans-unit.target: Criar um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler>delegar e adicioná-lo para ser notificado sobre <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Call GetPageNumberAsync specifying the `contentPosition` desired and a unique `userState` object that will be used to identify the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: Chamar GetPageNumberAsync especificando o `contentPosition` desejado e um exclusivo `userState` objeto que será usado para identificar a tarefa assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: When the event occurs and the delegate is called, compare the event's <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> property with the original GetPageNumberAsync `userState` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando o evento ocorre e o representante é chamado, compare o evento <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> propriedade com o original GetPageNumberAsync `userState` parâmetro.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> property matches the original GetPageNumberAsync `userState`, the operation is complete and the page number is ready.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> propriedade corresponde a GetPageNumberAsync original `userState`, a operação for concluída e o número da página está pronto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A> property will also match the original GetPageNumberAsync `contentPosition` parameter.) 5.
trans-unit.target: (O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A> propriedade também serão compatíveis com o original GetPageNumberAsync `contentPosition` parâmetro.)</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs> 5.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> property contains the zero-based page number of the specified `contentPosition`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> propriedade contém o número da página com base em zero especificada `contentPosition`.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A> provides similar functionality as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>, but for synchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A>fornece funcionalidade semelhante ao <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>, mas para operação síncrona.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A></xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content position element to return the page number of.
trans-unit.target: O elemento da posição do conteúdo para retornar o número da página.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador exclusivo para a tarefa assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*>foi concluída.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the position of the specified page in the document's content.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém a posição da página especificada no conteúdo do documento.

trans-unit.source: The page whose position is needed.
trans-unit.target: A página cuja posição é necessária.

trans-unit.source: A representing the position of page.
trans-unit.target: Um representando a posição do page .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pagination is performed automatically in the background in response to certain events, such as a change in page size.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a paginação é executada automaticamente em segundo plano em resposta a determinados eventos, como uma alteração no tamanho da página.

trans-unit.source: When `true`, pagination is performed in the background, raising <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> events as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Quando `true`, a paginação é executada em segundo plano, gerando <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>eventos conforme apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: Pagination of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> content, as distinct from a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> is not affected by changes to the visual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Paginação de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>conteúdo, diferentes de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>não é afetada pelas alterações para o visual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if background pagination is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a paginação em segundo plano estiver habilitada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when all document content has been paginated.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando todo o conteúdo de documento foi paginado.

trans-unit.source: When PaginationCompleted occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A> is `true` until a new pagination is initiated.
trans-unit.target: Quando ocorre a PaginationCompleted, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>é `true` até que um novo paginação é iniciada.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one or more content pages have been paginated.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma ou mais páginas de conteúdo tiveram sido paginadas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> properties <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> identify the range of pages paginated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>propriedades <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>identificar o intervalo de páginas paginados.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A></xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
